item.title: Git Submodules
item.description: Function Command Add a submodule git submodule add <url> <local-dest> Clonse submodules with parent git clone --recurse-submodules Clone submodules after parent git submodule update --init Remove submodule git submodule deinit -f <path-to-submodule>
